pull_request.title: Bump @adguard/aglint from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5
pull_request.body:
Bumps [@adguard/aglint](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AGLint) from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5.
Release notes

Sourced from @​adguard/aglint's releases.

v2.1.5

See CHANGELOG.md for the list of changes.

Changelog

Sourced from @​adguard/aglint's changelog.

2.1.5 - 2025-05-05

Added

  • Support of cli platform #251.

#251: AdguardTeam/AGLint#251

Commits
  • 7178b78 AG-42057 add support of cli platform. #251
  • 37efd47 Fix increment script
  • a634ed2 AG-41223 update node to v22 and pnpm to v10 [aglint]
  • See full diff in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=@adguard/aglint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=2.1.4&new-version=2.1.5)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/204249#issuecomment-2845731653
>AdGuard is no longer blocking ads on sites like cnn.com, wsj.com.

I'm not able to reproduce it.
Please try to disable then enable content blockers in Safari settings, restart Safari and check for filters update. Do not close AdGuard window for 30-60 seconds (until update process will be finished).

comment.body:
Most of videos are paid, but this one seems to works (when I'm logged in and with VPN) - `https://www.atresplayer.com/flooxer/series/biara-proyecto-lazarus/temporada-1/capitulo-1-riesgo-biologico_67a6038a64ceca00070f4f67/` and I can reproduce anti-adblock when `www3.doubleclick.net` is blocked.
Regarding `7db96.v.fwmrm.net`, it's not blocked by DNS on my end, and I don't see any ads when it's not blocked, also blocking it seems to cause a few seconds delay before video starts playing.

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;

review.body:
## Pull Request Overview

This PR aims to fix the full‐screen subscription popup issue on article pages for Substack-based sites by updating and consolidating CSS filters. Key changes include:
- Combining multiple domain-specific filters into one comprehensive rule.
- Removing redundant or conflicting filters for several domains.
- Adjusting selectors to target the intended subscription dialog elements more precisely.


<details>
<summary>Comments suppressed due to low confidence (1)</summary>

**AnnoyancesFilter/Popups/sections/subscriptions_specific.txt:1417**

```
-blog.corkmac.app,substack.com##.newsletter-post > div[class*="subscribeDialog"]
```
</details>

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.facebook.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2F) ### Comment > Al tener la extensión habilitada, facebook deja de funcionar correctamente.
